com.cyc.query

Interface QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<T extends QueryAnswerExplanation>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of QueryAnswerExplanation to be generated
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProofViewGenerator

    public interface QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<T extends QueryAnswerExplanation>
    An interface for representing and generating QueryAnswerExplanations for a specific answer to a query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generate()
      Flesh out this explanation, setting its root node and tree structure underneath the root.
      static <T extends QueryAnswerExplanation>
      QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<T>      		 get(QueryAnswer answer, QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification<T> spec)
      Finds and returns an instance of a QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator suitable for generating and returning a QueryAnswerExplanation for a given QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification.
      QueryAnswer getAnswer()
      Returns the inference answer justified by this object
      T getExplanation()
      Return the explanation, generating one if necessary via a call to generate().

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static <T extends QueryAnswerExplanation> QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator<T> get(QueryAnswer answer,
                                                                                 QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification<T> spec)
        Finds and returns an instance of a QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator suitable for generating and returning a QueryAnswerExplanation for a given QueryAnswerExplanationSpecification.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of QueryAnswerExplanation to be generated.
        Parameters:
        answer - the answer for which to generate a QueryAnswerExplanation.
        spec - the configuration parameters for QueryAnswerExplanation generation.
        Returns:
        a QueryAnswerExplanationGenerator.

      • getExplanation

        T getExplanation()
          throws OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
        Return the explanation, generating one if necessary via a call to generate().
        Returns:
        a QueryAnswerExplanation
        Throws:
        OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException - when run against an OpenCyc server

       throws OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
        Flesh out this explanation, setting its root node and tree structure underneath the root.
